about_the_game:
Welcome to the Deadliest Laboratory!
Here, there are no coincidences—only calculation, tactics, and cold luck. In 9mm Roulette💀, your fate is decided with the pull of the trigger of a Magnum 9mm. A deadly experiment is underway in a secret laboratory, where you must outplay your opponents using wit, strategy, and psychological pressure.

Make your choice: shoot yourself to gain an extra turn or fire at your opponent to take them out of the game. Keep a close eye on the magazine—it holds both live and blank rounds, and only calculated decisions will help you avoid a fatal mistake.

Face off against up to three real players. Bluff, predict your opponents’ moves, and take control of the situation to be the last one standing in this lethal experiment.

Key Features

👥 Multiplayer for up to 4 Players
Test your nerve and strategic thinking against friends. Every decision could be your last, and every shot could change the course of the game. Play solo or form fragile alliances—but remember, only one will survive in the end.

🔫 Tactical Russian Roulette
This isn’t just a game of chance—it’s a deadly experiment where calculation outweighs luck. Track the bullets in the magazine, analyze probabilities, bluff, mislead your opponents, and make cold, calculated decisions. One wrong move, and you're out.

💥 Intense Survival Gameplay
Every action must be carefully considered—do you risk shooting yourself for an extra turn, or do you play it safe and wait for the perfect opportunity? Here, victory belongs not just to the lucky, but to those who can strategize, manipulate, and withstand the psychological pressure.

🔥 Test your luck or become another failed experiment!

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages or for viewing at work, including depictions of violence, blood, suicide, and self-harm. Viewer discretion is advised

name: 9mm Roulette 💀 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X compatible
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Step into the deadliest bar in town with the 9mm Roulette demo! Smash everything, choose between shooting yourself or your opponent, and use crazy items to survive. Enjoy ragdoll physics, dark humor, and high-stakes chaos where every shot decides your fate! 💥
